data.text: @loopholelifstyl @CityNewsVAN Maybe you should look up science
@dgbennett666 @CityNewsVAN Yes, I am one of them. Its not everyone’s responsibility to keep me safe. I am vaccinated and I take responsibility for my own health period.

@reduction_deep @388Stavros @SmlSoul @CityNewsVAN Well funnily enough, the majority thinking believes in this medical garbage instead of being political garbage. I come from Romania and we've been through totalitarianism before, so we know when something smells like political BS and when it doesn't. This absolutely does.
@CityNewsVAN Bc giving us such a headache,  let it go!

@CityNewsVAN I told you BC would be last to stop this wasteful policy.The science they claim to follow is clear these policies are futile.They do more harm than good but the NDP won't listen?#maskmandate https://t.co/F5gEP4GJx2
@ccalchan1 @steptuner444 @CityNewsVAN Well I wear 12 hours a day and am tired of it that’s my useless point!!

@reduction_deep @schtev69 @CityNewsVAN Ok. Could be simply ignorance. I doubt its intentional. The "pro" side engages in the same. The clear majority have lifted restrictions. 
My question is: You could easily read the intent of the post yet take the time to smear an entire group as liars. Why?
